Extension 0..*ExtensionRelated problem header condition (target)
extension 0..*ExtensionSlice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:type 0..*Extension
url 1..1uri"type"
valueCode:valueCode 0..1codeCondition relationship type
Binding: Care Connect Condition Relationship (required)
extension:target 1..1Extension
url 1..1uri"target"
valueReference:valueReference 0..1Reference(CareConnect-ProblemHeader-Condition-1)Target problem header condition
url 1..1uri"https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/Extension-CareConnect-RelatedProblemHeader-1"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format

name: Extension-CareConnect-RelatedProblemHeader-1
description: A reference to another related problem header condition (target) whose relationship is defined by the relationship type code.

element.definition: Related problem header condition (target).

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
